name: Detective T.Ruth Black
description:
its 1998, Crime roams the streets, Deceit spews from every corner, And in their times only one man can fix it. Detective T Ruth Black. he crawls the streets looking for cases that he can put his intelligence into. With his trusty flashlight of knowledge and the light of truth he mist pick the sheets clean of information and maybe even a scrap of truth that can help him. Along the way he'll discover truth, lies, traps, and tribulations, and if his lights go out he loses the rhythm and has to start back at square one, But For Detective T Ruth Black he will stop at nothing to find the truth

A/<:Left

D/>:Right
